content: I suggest that one of the ways to support eod technicians and their families is to raise awareness about their sacrifices to the public. you can also donate to organizations that support military families, such as the wounded warrior project or the uso. these organizations provide a range of services and support to military members and their families, including counseling, financial assistance, education, and job placement. another way to support them is to write a letter or send a care package to active-duty eod technicians or their families to let them know that their service and sacrifice are appreciated.
